text: In this video, I will make the case for paying more attention to Google parent Alphabet(NASDAQ: GOOGL)(NASDAQ: GOOG) despite all the recent OpenAI announcements such as Sora and a possible Google Search competitor. *Stock prices used were from the trading day of Feb. 15, 2024.
